content: st 17 third tab beginning in stitch 34 repeat directions as for the first tab beginning in marked st 34 4 fourth tab beginning in stitch 50 repeat directions as for the first tab beginning in marked st 50 once all four tabs have been completed use the long tail of each tab end to whip stitch the tabs along the inside of the bag to the corresponding sts of the last completed round of the bag body i found it helpful to work two passes through each stitch for additional strength finishing up ● weave in any remaining yarn ends ● cut 4 strands of 3 mm macrame cord and set 2 strands aside working with one set thread them through all 4 tabs beginning at the front left tab working around in a counterclockwise manner secure both ends together with a half knot on the left hand side of the bag ● with your second set of 3 mm macrame cord thread them through all 4 tabs beginning at the front right tab working around in a clockwise manner secure both ends together with a half knot on the right hand side of the bag ● fill your bag with whatever strikes your fancy and enjoy © merri purdy 07/07/2025 for additional pattern support occasional cals free patterns and a wonderful crochet community consider joining my facebook group purdy sweet crochet https //www facebook com/groups/2379015795705856/ 5
